Hi! My names Eric, a 20 year old Junior Software developer based in Tallinn Estonia making my first steps into the bigger development world.

My programming journey initially started from the Tallinn Polytechnic school where I'd study software development for 3 years and end the school with a cool speech and an even cooler gold medal for: "Great Contribution to school activities!"

On the journey my curiousity led me to scout into other genres of development, and a big part grew to be "web development", thus most of my "webmastering" has been self thought since my school major concentrated specifically on Software development, so software design, design patterns, algorithms and so on.

I've grown a big liking toward software UX and Design, thus every day I try to broaden my vocabulary on different design development methods to start crafting much cooler user-experiences more efficiently and faster.
